location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Robert Taylor

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Lieutenant that as William Bruce must depart for Bussora [Basra], he has been placed in temporary charge of the Bushire Residency. It furnishes him information relating to advances for the Marine Agent and Sir Gore Ouseley that he will be expected to facilitate.
